import React ,{useState} from 'react' import "./ExpenseForm.css" const ExpernseForm = () =>{ const titleChangeHandler= (e) =>{ console.log(e.target.value) } const amountChangeHandler=(e) =>{ console.log(e.target.value) } const dateChangeHandler=(e) =>{ console.log(e.target.value) } return
} export default ExpernseForm;
